title: Making The Most of a Majority (PMQs)
itunes:title: Making The Most of a Majority (PMQs)
description:
With major projects in the works, it's all go for Boris Johnson's fledgling government but Bloomberg Opinion's Therese Raphael wonders if the Tories can manage it all.

And a battle brews with Brussels over financial services. John Barass, deputy chief executive of financial industry body PIMFA, tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Sebastian Salek that equivalence may not be necessary after Brexit but a managed transition is.

Ahead of Labour's TV leadership debate, Paula Surridge from Bristol University says the party's defeat runs deeper than Corbyn and Brexit.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
